title: Scorpions - Tokyo Tapes (1978) [FLAC] {2015 Reissue}
description:
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

                                Tokyo Tapes (1978)
              {50th Anniversary Deluxe and Remastered Edition, 2015}                  

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 Artists: Scorpions
 Musicians:

    Rudolf Schenker - rhythm guitar, lead guitar, backing vocals
    Klaus Meine - vocals 
    Ulrich Jon Roth - lead guitar, lead vocals (on 'Polar Nights', 
       'Dark Lady', 'Hell Cat'), backing vocals
    Francis Buchholz - bass
    Herman Rarebell - drums

 Title: Tokyo Tapes 
 Genre: Hard Rock / Heavy Metal
 Label: BMG
 Released: 2015
 Originally Released: 1978
 Cat #: 538159542
 Artists Country: Germany
 Release Country: Germany
 Source: CDDA
 Audio Codec: FLAC (.flac) 
 Format: tracks / .cue / log / complete artwork 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 [01]. All Night Long
